programme.title: Christmas, and Alistair Cooke meets a computer
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke's trepidation upon meeting a computer that already knows all about him.
programme.medium_synopsis: A 1940s style flight to Vermont brings Alistair Cooke to his family and a computer which has swallowed several libraries, a few archives and already knows all about him.
